messages.title: yoga
messages.subtitle: pranayam yoga
messages.formattedText:
1.Sit in a comfortable cross-legged position such as Easy Pose (Sukhasana).
Close the right nostril with your right thumb.
2.Inhale deeply through the left nostril.
Close the left nostril with the ring finger of your right hand as you release the right nostril.
3.Exhale slowly through your right nostril.
Keeping the left nostril closed, inhale deeply through your right nostril.
Seal the right nostril again with your thumb, then release the left nostril.
4.Exhale out of the left nostril. You should now be in the original position, with the thumb sealing the right nostril.
5.Repeat the process ten times, gradually increasing
